name: Wild Ride Web Version
description:
RATE US IN THE JAM :D 

 https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020/rate/698095

In Wild Ride™, there are only 2 buttons, allowing you turn left and right, however, as you progress, the buttons keep changing, requiring you to think fast and act faster. Enjoy as you drive through an endless vaporwave themed drifting course filled with obstacles and other interesting objects!

The longer you survive, the more point you can rack up, but watch out for bombs and keep you eye out for gates - pass through them to get more points!

Controls: Every Button on your keyboard! (starting with A and D)

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020! (Theme: Out of control)
